overview:
L.G. Fairmont Group 150 Broadway, New York, NY 10038 212-545-0729 http://www.lgfairmont.com/

LG Fairmont was founded in 2010 by Columbia MBA’s Derek Lee and Aaron Graf and has quickly made a name for itself in the high end market in Manhattan. LG Fairmont Group is a team of highly qualified and experienced real estate brokers and agents who offer personalized assistance and expert advice. The firm is committed in helping clients in find the perfect Manhattan real estate property to buy or rent, as well as assisting owners in selling their assets in New York.
